channel.title: Comments on: Weird Bird Friday – I have never seen such a Turkey

item.title: By: DougNic
item.dc:creator: DougNic
item.description: good to hear from you sue..well if it was a domestic turkey it would be in some kinda barn or fencing to protect from preditors and more importantly wandering off. the boy should be smaller than the girl...that kinda animal wifery stuff (kinda like what you do with john) and if they are wild they never would have got that close to any place men hangs out cause they shoot them...even the indians had a tough time hunting them...thus let's talk turkey..
item.content:encoded: good to hear from you sue..well if it was a domestic turkey it would be in some kinda barn or fencing to protect from preditors and more importantly wandering off. the boy should be smaller than the girl…that kinda animal wifery stuff (kinda like what you do with john) and if they are wild they never would have got that close to any place men hangs out cause they shoot them…even the indians had a tough time hunting them…thus let’s talk turkey..

item.title: By: susankay500
item.dc:creator: susankay500
item.description: I obviously don't know turkeys. What's so weird about the picture? --Susan
item.content:encoded: I obviously don’t know turkeys. What’s so weird about the picture? –Susan
